Contact the Painting with a Twist Headquarters Javascript must be enabled for the correct page display Skip to Content Find a Location Events Find a Location Events Paint Your Pet Book Club Family Day Girls Night Date Night Trivia Night Team Building Blacklight Host a Party Pop In & DIY More Gift Cards Take Home Paint Kits What is Painting with a Twist? Our Story Painting with a Purpose Blog Franchise Rewards Home Contact Our Corporate Office Painting with a Twist FAQ Painting with a Twist locations are independently owned and operated. This page provides contact information for the Franchise Headquarters office. To reach an individual studio location for reservations, events, customer service, donations, or other inquiries, please use the contact information on their homepage. Our location finder should get you pointed in the right direction. For donation requests, please reach out to your closest studio . Painting with a Twist headquarters will not respond to donation requests as each studio is owned and operated independently. Ask your owner about our successful Painting with a Purpose events for your organization! For franchising questions email franchising@paintingwithatwist.com . For media inquires email marketing@paintingwithatwist.com For gift card questions and support, please email giftcards@paintingwithatwist.com . For customer service issues, please contact your Painting with a Twist Studio directly. Our office hours are Monday - Friday, 9am - 5pm Central Standard Time. The Headquarters mailing address is: Painting with a Twist 2121 North Causeway Blvd, Suite 200 Mandeville, LA 70471 United States of America Find a Location Private Party About Franchise facebook youtube instagram pinterest Privacy Policy Contact Us Copyright © 2025 Painting with a Twist.® All art displayed on website is subject to copyright protection in favor of Painting with a Twist. Use of such is prohibited without written authorization from Painting with a Twist. Back to top

There’s always something fun happening at Painting with a Twist. Thursday - Pumpkin Path Thursday, September 11 | 7:00 PM Pumpkin Path $40-$50 Pick Your Product RESERVE A SEAT Monday - As Autumn Creeps In Monday, September 15 | 7:00 PM As Autumn Creeps In $40-$50 Pick Your Product RESERVE A SEAT Tuesday - BLACKLIGHT ~ Neon Crazy Daisies Tuesday, September 16 | 7:00 PM BLACKLIGHT ~ Neon Crazy Daisies $44 RESERVE A SEAT See all events Create some Colorful memories Girls Night Sick of the bar scene? Gather your best girls for an unforgettable night with paint, wine & lots of laughs. Date Night Skip dinner & and movie! Rekindle the spontaneity with a paint date with your partner. Trivia Night From wizards and zombies to space nights and 90s coffeehouse trivia, you can find a theme night you and your friends will love. Cheers to a little friendly competition! Paint Your Pet Your furry (or scaly) friends deserve some love, too! Turn your pet’s photo into a portrait with step-by-step instruction from our amazing artists. Bachelorette Parties Add a twist to the tried-and-true bachelorette party festivities with a night of painting, sipping and bonding for the I Do Crew! Team Building We specialize in not-so-corporate events to give your whole team a boost.  They won’t call in sick for this one! Family Day Bring your whole crew for a unique family outing they’ll never forget. You focus on quality time & we’ll handle the rest! Kids Events Set your kiddo’s creativity free with a new twist on fun! Book a birthday party, kids camp or Mommy & Me event! Planning an event? CUSTOMIZE A PRIVATE PARTY Wanna plan some fun? If you can think it, we can create it! At Painting with a Twist, the fun is endless. 240 locations 1,500 Artists 15,000 Unique painting events BOOK A CORPORATE EVENT CUSTOMIZE A PRIVATE PARTY Colorful Ideas November 28, 2024 BIGGEST sale of the year dropping on Friday! And More! Paint. Sip. SAVE! Our Black Friday Weekend sale is happening now! Visit our website to claim your promo code! Save $20 during our Black Friday sale, happening all weekend long!                         new Seawolves in creating a masterpiece. There will be two groups at registration.
                        You will either do a “Glow in the Dark Paint with a Twist” or “Paint with a Twist”. The cost of the program is $35. Painting with a Twist - Houston Group | LinkedIn Skip to main content LinkedIn Top Content People Learning Jobs Games Sign in Join now Painting with a Twist - Houston Group Entertainment Providers Houston, TX 57 followers 7 studios for Extraordinary Team Building, Office pARTies, Charity Fundraising:-) Follow View all 3 employees Report this company About us Painting with a Twist® painting sessions are fun art, not fine art. Invite your friends, sip your favorite beverage* and enjoy step-by-step instruction with our experienced and enthusiastic local artists. It's a colorful, casual party atmosphere where you'll leave your cares behind and go home with a one-of-a-kind painting created by you.

For businesses in the Houston community, we specialize in throwing the best team-building events! Our painting and wine pARTies are a highly collaborative experience, with options to do a puzzle or mosaic art where each person's canvas is a part of a larger piece of artwork! We also do custom art. Just send us a picture of a significant project meaningful to your team and we will convert it to a teachable piece of art! Or just choose a great piece of art from our library that everyone will enjoy!

There are so many options for team-building fun at Painting with a Twist at any of our 7 locations!
Midtown: https://www.paintingwithatwist.com/studio/houston-midtown/

Instead, paint your own painting of flowers to last all season long! DOWNLOAD FRANCHISE REPORT Meet The Leadership Team The Painting with a Twist management team brings a lot of franchise experience to the table Cathy Deano, Co-Founder Cathy Deano, co-founder of Painting with a Twist, began her mission of bringing joy to her hometown through volunteering in her community. After Hurricane Katrina devastated the area and her home, she knew there was something she could do to bring people together. She, along with co-founder Renee Maloney, came up with the idea of an art studio where women could gather, paint and relieve the stress of the day, while drinking wine! Painting with a Twist was born and is the largest paint and sip concept in the nation today. Cathy is the current President of the St. Tammany Art Association, a position she also held from 2006 – 2009. The Association provides quality programming and cultural enrichment to St. Tammany, supports established and emerging artists, and produces educational arts related activities for adults and children. Cathy also is on the Board of Friends of the Dew Drop.  The Dew Drop is the oldest unaltered jazz venue in the world. Cathy volunteers with a number of other organizations including The Franchisor Forum for the International Franchise Association. She is a lifelong resident of Mandeville and has one son, Ryan. Her hobbies include traveling, reading, cooking and laughing. Todd Owen, Co-Owner & CEO Todd Owen is a co-owner and CEO of Painting with a Twist.  Todd owns multiple Painting with a Twist studios in Tampa, FL and founded TD Art Supply, a major supplier of art supplies.  After leading a large business for Walmart and a 31 year career,  he retired to immerse himself in Painting with a Twist.  As a franchisee since 2014 and small business owner, he has intricate knowledge in the arts and craft as entertainment space. He is also a former member of both the Painting with a Twist Franchise Advisory Council and IFA. Todd is passionate about our franchisees’ success and is based in Tampa, FL.  He firmly believes our franchisees are “the boss” and helping them achieve a return on their investment is all of our responsibilities.  Todd has four children (3 boys and a girl) ages 17-29, enjoys family time, playing golf, and fishing. Trey Manthey, Chief Technology Officer Trey has an unbridled enthusiasm for technology and Painting with a Twist. After honing his software development craft in the energy and aerospace sectors, he met with the Twist team on a fateful rainy evening in December of 2009. An agreement was struck, and the innovation began posthaste. From all the iterations of the Twist website, to developing our internal systems, tools, and integrations, Trey oversees it all. He lives in Littleton, Colorado with his two daughters. He is a world renowned whiskey connoisseur and a nationally ranked semi-professional cyclist with a small but fervent fan club. Brittany Graff, Director of Marketing Brittany Graff joined the Painting with a Twist team in February of 2019. With over 13 years of experience in marketing, Brittany brings a wealth of knowledge to the brand. As Director of Marketing, she leads the marketing strategy of Painting with a Twist with a goal to both build national brand awareness and deliver support programs and tools to increase sales at the local studio level. Brittany lives in Mandeville, LA with her husband, two daughters and French Mastiff. Katie Richard, Director of Operations Katie Richard joined the Painting with a Twist Headquarters team in April of 2012.  She oversees franchise operations and support, supply chain for the brand, as well as the corporate-owned Mandeville studio.  She graduated as a Certified Franchise Executive in February of 2017 from the International Franchise Association.  She has a passion for this amazing paint n sip business and working with our franchisee family.  Katie is married with 2 boys and is an avid runner. FAQs | Painting Party in Camarillo, CA | Painting with a Twist Javascript must be enabled for the correct page display Skip to Content Studio Home Camarillo, CA Events Studio Home Camarillo, CA Events Host a Party Pop In & DIY More Party Info At Home Kits Gift Cards Online Shop Contact Artists FAQ Blog Gallery Franchise Rewards Camarillo, CA Frequently Asked Questions Painting with a Twist FAQ GENERAL INFORMATION How do I sign up? See Events Calendar on our home page to find a painting that fits your taste and your schedule. Click on the painting and follow instructions to reserve your seat. Payment is required to reserve your seat and you can sign up online, over the phone, or in studio up to 30 minutes prior to the start of the class. If you are joining friends, please indicate whom you want to be seated with. You will receive a confirmation email with important information regarding your event. Please read the cancellation policy. How much does a class cost? 2 Hour painting events are anywhere from $42 - $54 3 Hour painting events are anywhere from $50 - $69 Specialty events vary in price. *Click on the painting of your choice to see the price per person. Is there an age limit? Yes, no one under the age of 21 is permitted in the studio. What is your Refund/Cancellation Policy? This is a live entertainment event. The Cancellation/Refund policy is non-negotiable. We understand that last-minute emergencies and unforeseen events happen, but due to the nature of this event, the Cancellation/Refund policy will be applied without exception. Full refund will be given for individuals canceling with at least 48 hours notice. A store credit will be given for individuals canceling with at least 24 hours notice. Same Day cancellation or "No Shows" will not be issued store credit or refunds. Please check weather, traffic, and road conditions prior to your scheduled event in order to ensure timely arrival. If you are late to the class you may not be allowed to paint and your payment will be forfeited. Please leave a voice message or text if calling after hours, 805-484-4444. Painting with a Twist reserves the right to cancel classes for unforeseen circumstances or low reservation counts. Registrants will be notified by email and refunds or store credits will be processed immediately. There are no refunds on Virtual events or Twist-at-Home kits. I can't even draw a straight line! How do I know which class is easy or hard? Have no fear...we are fun art, not fine art! Every class is geared towards beginning painters and our team of awesome artists will help you recreate a beautiful painting with step-by-step instructions in a happy, fun place. No experience or skills are required. What should I expect? A fun time! Every class has a different personality and we can never predict how loud or quiet the experience will be. Whether a crowded weekend class with lots of parties or a smaller weekday paint session, you are sure to have a great time. This is where adults come to uncork the fun! What should I bring? - Your ID to prove you're over 21 years of age. Expect to get carded even if you're well over 21 years of age! If we cannot verify your age, you will be turned away. - If you're worried about getting paint on your fancy clothes or designer purse, please leave them at home so you don't have to worry about it. It's best to be prepared for the occasional "happy little accident" of a paint or wine spill. Can you save my spot until I pay at the studio instead? All seats must be paid for no later than 30 minutes prior to start of event. The studio needs to know you're coming so we can prepare your seat, supplies, and any seating requests. If you cannot pay online, please be at the studio 30-minutes early to pay for your seat. We will do our best, but cannot always guarantee walk-in reservations. Can I come by myself or do I have to be in a group or party? Of course you can come by yourself! Let us know if you're just wanting some "me" time, or if you want to meet new people and mingle! This is also a fun and safe place to meet a new date, or get together with old friends. I didn't get a confirmation email. Am I registered? Please call or email our studio to confirm your reservation if you did not receive a confirmation. It's likely the result of a typo and we can easily correct your information and resend the confirmation. Do you do reserved seating? Yes, please note all members of your party that you would like to sit with when you make your reservation. Can my friends come and watch us without painting? No, everyone must have a paid seat to stay on premises during all classes. There was a class on the calendar and now the painting is different. What happened to the original painting? Paintings are often changed if there is no interest in the class. The only way we know someone is interested in a painting is if they sign up. If you see something you like, please reserve early otherwise you run the risk of the painting being changed. Will my painting be dry by the end of the night? Yes, if there are a few damp places we have hair dryers that will dry them quickly. CHILDREN & FAMILY EVENTS Do you ever have children's events in the studio? Can kids attend with an adult? - Due to the sale of beer and wine in the studio, no persons under the age of 21 are permitted in the studio at any time. There are no exceptions to this. Twist at Home kit for kids are available here . - Private virtual events are available for all-ages. If you are interested in a virtual, all-ages event, please submit a Party Request . If the alcohol is locked up, can you have people under 21 in the studio? What about for a private party? No, no one under the age of 21 is permitted in the studio. There are no exceptions to this even for a private party. FOOD & BEVERAGES Is a glass of wine or beer included with the registration? No. We do not include beverages in the price of a seat, but they are available for purchase at our bar. Can I bring my own wine? We are a licensed bar featuring popular wine and beer selections. BYOB is not permitted. No outside beverages of any kind are permitted in the studio, including water. Alcoholic beverages and soft drinks are available for purchase at the bar. Do you sell food or snacks? We have potato chips, candy, and other snacks for sale. You are welcome to bring any food or snacks, but please keep it on the smaller side. Also, please bring your own plates, utensils and condiments as we do not carry any food-service items. We cannot guarantee a food table during our weekend events. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION Event Pictures and Videos Disclaimer We take a lot of pictures and videos of our painting parties for Facebook, Instagram, and other social media promotions. If you do not want to be included in such pictures, please advise a member of the staff upon arrival. If we inadvertently include you in a social media picture, please contact the studio and we will be happy to remove it upon your request. Private Events or Corporate Team Building Please see the Party Info page for more information on booking an ins-studio or virtual private party. Corporate Team Building; Girl's Night Out; Date Night; Bunco Group; Bachelorette Celebration; Birthday Parties; Showers; Graduations; Office Party, and more! Painting with a Twist is a fun, unique opportunity for any of your group party needs. Studio available 7 days a week. Painting with a Purpose Fundraisers Painting with a Purpose is a monthly fundraising event for local and national charities with a portion of class registration sales donated to the given organization. We offer a fun activity that allows the organization's supporters to socialize and network in a creative environment. In order to qualify as a PWAP partner, your organization must complete an application for consideration. Please inquire by email or text FUNDRAISER to 805-484-4444. Finding Us Don't get lost on the way! If you're using a Map Application, please make sure to choose our address at 2298 VENTURA BLVD. in CAMARILLO, where Arneill Rd. and Ventura Blvd. intersect. Don't hesitate to call us if you need directions. 805-484-4444 Find a Location Private Party About Franchise facebook instagram Privacy Policy Contact Us Copyright © 2025 Painting with a Twist.® All art displayed on website is subject to copyright protection in favor of Painting with a Twist.
